author: erodriguez
msg: Bumping up Change Password protocol version to 0.5.1 to begin tracking as its own project in JIRA and since it utilizes much of the Kerberos infrastructure (which is already version 0.5.1).

author: erodriguez
msg: Updated kerberos-common cipher hashed adapter to support Change Password protocol, DIRCHANGEPW-1:
o  Updated Hashed Adapter to work with Kerberos' Private and Application Reply message components.
o  Added Encodable interface to message components.
o  Added Encoder and EncoderFactory interface to message components.
o  Added Decoder and DecoderFactory interface to message components.
